2019 Week 13 Results

geru | 03 Dec 2019

Congratulations to this week’s winners:

  1. JekellP - 152.52 fpts
  2. arianna29 - 147.22 fpts
  3. hlimardo - 137.2 fpts

Welcome to the winner’s circle, arianna29! This week was full of interesting stats, here’s a few:

  • Entering Week 13, the Patriots had allowed 4 passing touchdowns all season. They allowed 4 passing touchdowns to the arms of Deshaun Watson and DeAndre Hopkins on #SundayNightFootball alone. source
  • The Seahawks are 10-2 after 12 games with a +36 point differential. That’s the lowest differential for a 10-win team through 12 games in NFL history. source
  • Lamar Jackson has reached 15+ MPH on 71 carries this season, most in the NFL entering tonight. source
  • And, subjectively, the Dolphins had the best trick play of week:

The Dolphins just executed the most beautiful trick play you will see today.

(via @NFL)pic.twitter.com/RnrEUbALii

— CBS Sports HQ (@CBSSportsHQ) December 1, 2019

There are only 3 weeks left! Check the Help page and Weekly Analysis below for tips and put together your best lineup of the year to earn some more money and gloating privileges before the season comes to a close. Good luck. Commissioner Maduro, out!

It was good to finally have #AlshonJeffery back. As Alshon had 9 catches, 137 yards, 15.2 YDS AVG, and 1 TD. Having his first 100 yard game of the season. Big game for #17. Offense looked a hell of a lot better with him in the lineup. PC: Philadelphia Eagles Website 📸 #FlyEaglesFly🦅 #PHIvsMIA
